name: Messland
description:
CONCEPT

Messland is a puzzle game where the dungeon map.. is a mess!
You must find a way to go away: using powerup,
rotating and shifting piece of the map...
This game was created for the GMI COMPETITION 2020:
Messland has been placed 9/19 and it takes the honorable mention "Innovative mechanic".

FEATURE

PowerUp for your character..
.. for your boomerang..
... and for the map!
Highscore Table Online!
Multiple ways to complete the game

CONTROLS

Arrow Key = Move
J = Attack / Shift Map (if you can)
U = Open Dungeon Map
H = Rotate Map (if you can)
